channel.title: No mouse in game menu
channel.description: I just installed the game and i have no mouse cursor in the main menu or while accessing the menu during game play. This is really annoying and prevents me from changing most of my settings. I have messed with the mouse options in windows but it didnt change anything. Mouse trails are off.
